attributes.action: Release full details the membership of the European Research Group (ERG).
attributes.additional_details: Because it is clearly unfair that the voting public does not have knowledge of the political direction of some of the prospective MPs they may choose to vote for.
attributes.background: Debate and vote on the above. The public is paying the membership fees for the ERG therefore should be cognisant of its membership

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Oversight of the expenses MPs or groups of MPs can claim is undertaken by the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA). Releasing information relating to payments for pooled staffing services, including providing details of which MPs have made claims in relation to such services, is therefore a matter for IPSA, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can find more information on IPSA's website:
https://www.theipsa.org.uk/
